properties.description: Warm welcome space, open to all. We offer free WiFi, public computers, printing services, activities, groups and study areas. Our Winter Coat Exchange runs from October â€“ March. You can donate coats, or simply take one for free if you need it. Library membership is not required to use the space, but it is available, providing free access to books, eBooks, eMagazines and eNewspapers, health equipment, language learning, iPad loans and more... For more information on our services, please visit: https://www.somerset.gov.uk/libraries/
properties.title: Dulverton Library

properties.description: Join us throughout the autumn and winter for FREE refreshments (tea, coffee, biscuits & fruit, FREE self-led activities (jigsaws, board games, simple crafts, newspapers, magazines etc), FREE wifi, desks to work from and of course, book and audiobooks to read & borrow. We also have lots of groups to enjoy - for details of dates and times, just pop in.
properties.title: South Molton Library
